Wireless Network Watcher is a free software that scans your wireless network and shows all the connected devices. It's a great tool for monitoring your Wi-Fi network and ensuring that no unauthorized devices are connected to it.

In this article, we'll explore how Wireless Network Watcher works, its features, and how you can use it to secure your network.

## Features

Wireless Network Watcher has several features that make it a powerful tool for monitoring your Wi-Fi network.

### Scan Your Network

Wireless Network Watcher scans your network and shows all the connected devices. You can see the IP address, MAC address, device name, and other details for each connected device.

### Alert Notifications

You can set Wireless Network Watcher to alert you when a new device connects to your network. This is a great feature for monitoring your network and ensuring that no unauthorized devices are accessing it.

### Export Data

Wireless Network Watcher allows you to export the scan results to a variety of file formats, including HTML, CSV, and XML. This makes it easy to share the results with others or import the data into other applications.

### Portable Version

Wireless Network Watcher is also available as a portable version. This means you can run it from a USB drive without installing anything on your computer.

## How to Use Wireless Network Watcher

Using Wireless Network Watcher is easy. Simply download and install the software, then run it.

1. Download Wireless Network Watcher from the official website.

2. Install the software on your computer.

3. Run Wireless Network Watcher. The software will automatically scan your network and show all connected devices.

4. Review the scan results. You can export the results to a file if needed.

5. Set up alert notifications if desired.

## Conclusion

Wireless Network Watcher is a powerful tool for monitoring your Wi-Fi network. It's easy to use and offers several features that make it a great choice for securing your network.

Whether you're a home user or a business, Wireless Network Watcher can help you keep your network safe and free from unauthorized devices.

So why not try it out today? Download Wireless Network Watcher and start monitoring your network with ease.
